file.author: Artistical, Comrade Beep, doom_pope, Greenwood, Grome, H4724, ionous, JCR, Juzley, Lunaran, Markie Music, Newhouse, Pinchy, PoolboyQ, quasiotter, RadiatorYang, Shadesmaster
file.title: Coppertone Summer Jam
file.description:
Community mapping event based on the Copper mod: 16 levels of varying sizes and texture themes plus a start map. It contains custom skyboxes, a few new sounds/models, and some music tracks. The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require Copper 1.11 and a source port with increased limits + BSP2 support.

file.author: Fairweather, Alekswithak, Bal, Dragons for Lunch, Datram57, Eber150, Greenwood, h4724, Mazu, HrnekBezucha, Ionous, iYago, Mittens for Kittens, Pinchy, ptoing, radiatoryang, riktoi, stickflip, Sze, Trashbang, Xeo, zigi
file.title: Coppertone Summer Jam 2 v1.0
file.description:
UPDATE, 11 August 2022: This version has major bugs. The authors strongly recommend playing the v1.2 patched version instead.

Big map jam pack with 22 levels ranging from small to large, with veteran and beginner designers. Maps were made in 2 1/2 weeks, with hot sunny theming encouraged but not required.

Includes custom start map with built-in difficulty select. Uses Copper v1.19 (already included) and co-op supported. QuakeC source is also included, as well as some MAP source.

Note: requires a modern engine / source port with increased limits.

file.author: Fairweather, Alekswithak, Bal, Dragons for Lunch, Datram57, Eber150, Greenwood, h4724, Mazu, HrnekBezucha, Ionous, iYago, Mittens for Kittens, Pinchy, ptoing, radiatoryang, riktoi, stickflip, Sze, Trashbang, Xeo, zigi
file.title: Coppertone Summer Jam 2 v1.2
file.description:
Big map jam pack with 22 levels ranging from small to large, with veteran and beginner designers. Maps were made in 2 1/2 weeks, with hot sunny theming encouraged but not required.

This is version 1.2, which fixes major bugs in the progs and maps.

Includes custom start map with built-in difficulty select. Uses Copper v1.19 (already included) and co-op supported. QuakeC source is also included, as well as some MAP source.

Note: requires a modern engine / source port with increased limits.

file.author: Tim Elek

[repacked for Quaddicted]

file.author: czg

file.author: DaZ
file.title: Arabian Nights
file.description: An essential 3-map classic crafted in a sadlark-like egypt style.

file.author: DaZ
file.title: Ground Zero
file.description: A nice huge IKBase styled map.

file.author: Fairweather
file.title: Dead But Dreaming
file.description:
Large Knave-textured level. Comes with a 100% completion demo (protocol 666). The map source is included.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Annihilator
file.title: Double Back
file.description: Small to medium sized white brick temple.

file.author: Lethargy Software
file.title: Death's Dominion
file.description:
Single player campaign with two episodes, each consisting of five small to medium sized maps in varying themes, created by Alex "MonkeyDonut" Gingell, Ben "Hierarchy" Shribman, Rich "Xtermin8" Lawson, Dan "Infliction" Haigh. OK.

Note: This map pack requires Scourge of Armagon.

file.author: mukor
file.title: Disengage the Simulator
file.description:
Smallish slaughter-map "simulation" in a DE_DUST (from Counter Strike) setting, complete with dead terrorists and plantable bombs. Comes with custom textures, models, and sounds. The map source and a texture wad are included.

Note: This map requires Arcane Dimensions 1.70 and a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Marc Roussel
file.title: The Wrong Way
file.description: Small wizard map that requires finding some secrets to proceed. Comes with two demos.

file.author: Drakkon (C.D. Roberts)
file.title: Bloodstone
file.description: Small to medium Metal map. First version of Bldstone.

file.author: Jim Ahara
file.title: Devil's Decree
file.description: Smallish map with mixed texture themes. Includes a chapel and stairs, and blue bricks.

file.author: Redfield
file.title: The Deepness Below
file.description:
Small underwater map with custom textures and monsters, and the author's trademark 'Disneyness'.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Flavio 'GinKo' Quadros
file.title: Dimension of the Diminished
file.description: Small level that combines one room from each map in Quake's first episode into a cute little summary or reminder of it.

file.author: RickyT23
file.title: Deja - Vu !
file.description:
A small 5-map episode for Quoth. Starts with base maps and ends in a Doom-like "hell bunker". Somewhat crude design at times, but fun to play.

This file was repackaged by Spirit. You can find the original .zip in the trash

file.author: Peter Bisseker (tiddles)
file.title: The Demons Lair
file.description: Medium sized Metal level. Quite hard.

file.author: Mike Wilberforce (Hellscrag)
file.title: (The Final) Descent
file.description: Episode with 9 medium to large maps (including a secret map) in varying styles - Base/Wizard/Metal - with many caverns and fortesses, and a few new monsters.

file.author: Jim Lowell
file.title: House of Desolution
file.description: Small medieval building with a lava area. OK.

file.author: S. Mennier
file.title: Desolate Outpost
file.description: Small to medium sized Base map.

file.author: Steve Rescoe
file.title: Liquid Despair
file.description: Improved version of the first Liquid Despair map. A medium sized Episode4-style map relying on water for progression in all directions.

file.author: Juha Koiste
file.title: Death Church
file.description: Smallish oldschool Medieval map: a church with a graveyard and many corridors.

file.author: Rick Troppman
file.title: The Death Trap
file.description: Medium sized Metal map with a few DOOM textures. Fairly random architecture. Barely average.

file.author: Gillian Vos
file.title: Devotion
file.description:
Medium sized medieval monastery in a classic-ish style for vanilla Quake. The author's first release. Map source is included.

"Explore the monastery, cursed by the eldritch creatures. Find the keys and defeat the evil beings that haunt this ground."

Note: may require a modern engine / source port with increased limits.

file.author: DragonsForLunch
file.title: Evil Wizard
file.description:
Small castle surrounded by mountains, using custom textures by Makkon. The map source is included.

Note: This map requires Arcane Dimensions 1.8 and thus a source port with increased limits.
[Cannot be run through the Quake Injector]

file.author: Dragons For Lunch
file.title: Flooded Ruins
file.description:
Small medieval-style level. The map source is included.
[Cannot be run through the Quake Injector]

file.author: DragonsForLunch
file.title: Godfreys Demesne
file.description:
Medium-sized medieval castle level. It is based on the Progs_dump mod (included) and comes with some custom sounds and models. The map and qc sources are included.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits.
The mod folder has a config.cfg file which may override the current user configuration.

file.author: DragonsForLunch
file.title: Weight For It
file.description: Large green brick/slime dungeon; a textured and re-lit version of the author's SM214 entry. It runs on the Progs_dump mod (included) and comes with a few new sounds and models.

file.author: David Nickerson
file.title: Dave\'s Graves
file.description: Small orange/rock church surrounded by a stone graveyard. The map source is included.

file.author: Iain Bruce
file.title: The Dig
file.description: Short SP unit with a mine base / estate theme (2.5 maps + start map) - quality construction and nice use of new progs (rotation, for instance); there are also some modified Grunts with new skins.

file.author: Digs
file.title: Digs01
file.description: Oldschool episode with nine small to medium-sized levels including a start map and a secret level. The maps are around id quality in terms of construction, style and gameplay. It also features a new rocket enforcer enemy type.

file.author: Digs
file.title: Digs02 - Virtual World
file.description: Small map with a unique Tron- or cyberspace-like texture theme.

file.author: Digs
file.title: Digs03
file.description: Large interconnected metal-style windtunnel map.

file.author: Digs
file.title: The Parallel Worlds
file.description:
A huge and highly detailed base map with a unique twist - it is actually three levels in one, to be played in succession. Each exit leads to a different version of the same map with modified layouts/routes and monster placement.

Note: This map requires an engine port with increased limits.

file.author: Digs
file.title: The Anomaly
file.description: Medium-sized base map with a unique twist: 'anomalies' have warped several areas which now play tricks on the player's mind and perception.

file.author: Digs
file.title: The Anomaly 2: Water
file.description:
Large brick/metal complex where reality is twisted and many optical illusions occur. Nonlinear, explorational gameplay with puzzles and a great number of secret areas. The sequel to digs05.

Note: This level requires an engine port with increased limits, and r_wateralpha to be set to 0.3

file.author: Digs
file.title: RJ Zone
file.description:
Very large, nonlinear base map with a unique twist: progression requires rocket jumping and the way to proceed is hidden, which essentially makes this a trick jump puzzle map (with respawning items) that can easily leave the player lost and confused.

Note: This map requires an engine port with increased limits.
An updated version is available here.

file.author: Digs
file.title: RJ Zone (Version 2)
file.description:
Very large, nonlinear base map with a unique twist: progression requires rocket jumping and the way to proceed is hidden, which essentially makes this a trick jump puzzle map (with respawning items) that can easily leave the player lost and confused.

Note: This map requires an engine port with increased limits. This is an updated version with bugfixes/tweaks.

file.author: Digs
file.title: The Isolation
file.description:
Large fortress with four differently-colored/textured areas around a Minecraft-styled courtyard.

Note: This map requires an engine port with increased limits. Support for colored lighting recommended.

file.author: digs
file.title: The Zombie's House
file.description:
Large village-type of level; a valley with several buildings including a mill and basement/dungeon areas beneath. It also comes with a few custom models and sounds.

Note: This map requires Quoth 2.2 and a source port with increased limits and BSP2 support.

file.author: digs
file.title: Untitled
file.description: Small and ugly beginner map with mixed texture themes.

file.author: digs
file.title: digs_4hour
file.description:
1 SP map / digs

A four hour speedmap made in response to a discussion on the nature of speedmapping in the sm177_pack release thread.

file.author: J.F.Gustafsson
file.title: Dirt!
file.description: Prolific mapper J.F Gustafsson's first map. While it is a mixture of good and bad, the classic 1997 vibe makes it fun to play. Quite small.

file.author: distrans
file.title: Ruined Nation
file.description:
Medium-sized base map using Doom 3 textures. It comes with a number of custom ambient sounds and features hard combat.

Note: This map requires Quoth.

file.author: Creed
file.title: Discordia
file.description: About medium sized Metal castle traversed by water.

file.author: Creed
file.title: Discordia II
file.description: Medium sized, plain Metal map with some water areas/sewer dungeon.

file.author: Chris Williams
file.title: Base of disgrace
file.description: Small and ugly Base map with a Medieval bit at the beginning.

file.author: reslario
file.title: Disjointed Realms
file.description:
Large abstract level with several huge locations surrounding a floating castle. The map source is included.

Note: This map requires Arcane Dimensions and a source port with increased limits.
[This map does not work with the Quake Injector]

file.author: Mikko Sandt
file.title: MSQ1: Distractions
file.description: Moody (ik)base map with outdoor parts.

file.author: marty
file.title: The Disturbed
file.description: Small Metal level.

file.author: CommonCold
file.title: Lots of Death Knights
file.description:
A very small (or very large) map pack made for April Fools as a joke pack. Inspired by the DOOM 2 map "100k Revenants" by MarphitimusBlackimus.... may contain Death Knights.

Custom start map and map source is included.

Note: requires a modern engine / source port with increased limits.

file.author: Tobias Person aka Tobey
file.title: Fortress of the Dark Knight
file.description: About medium sized, mostly cramped medieval castle with custom textures, reskinned zombies and a reskinned boss knight. OK.

file.author: Blitz, Headthump, Hrimfaxi, Jago, Zwiffle
file.title: 1000 Brush/Winter map pack
file.description:
1000 Brush mapping event, December 2004: the goal was to make a SP map using not more than 1000 brushes and DKTe3 textures.
As a result there are five about medium-sized maps by Blitz, Jago, Headthump, Hrimfaxi and Zwiffle, as well as a simple start map. Map sources are included.

file.author: Basil de Vries
file.title: DMxSP - The Deathmatch Experience
file.description: The original Quake deathmatch maps converted for single player mode.

file.author: TexGamer
file.title: Warmup
file.description:
Small Wizard map - a large hall and some small rooms. Uses a few Doom2 textures.
This file was repackaged by Spirit. You can find the original .zip in the trash

file.author: Alex Andreu (Deathmonger)
file.title: Installation of Disavowed
file.description: Small Base map that has to be played with the Badpak mod. Unfortunately, it is unfinished.

file.author: Alex Andreu (Deathmonger)
file.title: Stronghold of Battereds
file.description: About medium sized, action-intense Metal level.

file.author: Andrew 'than' Palmer
file.title: The Occupied Base
file.description: Professional remake of Quake's original deathmatch map DM3. Highly detailed and many expanded areas for single player, yet still maintaining the original layout in deathmatch mode. Map source is included.

file.author: negke
file.title: Bad Dark Cistern
file.description: Medium-sized brick/cistern-themed level for single player and deathmatch, based on Quake's stock levels DM5 and DM6, with an underwater DM4 below. The GPL map source is included.

file.author: Artistical, Bloodshot, Breezeep, Danzadan, digs, DraQu & Promeus, Giftmacher, ionous, Mariteaux, mukor, Naitelveni, NewHouse, onetruepurple, prengle, QueenJazz, rj, scar3crow, Shadesmaster, skacky, TheMusic, wedge_one, ww
file.title: DM4 Jam
file.description:
DM4 jam - a community project at Func_Msgboard.

The pack features 22 maps (including a start hub) recreating or reinterpreting the theme and style of the original DM4- The Bad Place. Three short demos and the map sources are included.

Note: Several of these maps require a source port with increased limits and/or BSP2 support.

There is an addon to this pack featuring updated versions of some of the maps and three new ones.

file.author: adib, Breezeep, Giftmacher, JCR, mariteaux, negke, prengle, scar3crow
file.title: DM4 Jam DLC Update
file.description:
DLC/Update for the DM4 Jam with improved versions of several maps and three previously unreleased levels. The start map has been updated with additional exits. Some custom skyboxes and the map sources are included.

Note: Some of these maps require a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Andrew 'than' Palmer
file.title: Round The U-Bend
file.description: Small base/industrial-style map. A reinterpretation of the original DM5 - part of than's ongoing DMxRMX series. The map source is included.

file.author: than
file.title: The Dark Portal
file.description:
A remake/remix of DM6 'The Dark Zone': Quake's stock deathmatch level turned into a large, industrial base-style singleplayer map. The map source is included.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Andrew 'than' Palmer
file.title: Geophobia
file.description: Professional remake of Quake's semi-stock map DM7: A small to medium-sized medieval fortress inside a canyon. The map source (in standard and WC format) is included.

file.author: David Minor
file.title: The Crypt
file.description: Medium sized blue Wizard level with a bit of button searching.

file.author: Dennis ;} Coolrip ]Q[ MtS
file.title: DM Arena1 (The Blood Bath)
file.description: Very small Metal level.

file.author: Connor Fitzgerald feat. Preacher, American McGee, ZTN, Ghandi, Pingu, Yataze, John Romero
file.title: Deathmatch Classics Vol. 1
file.description:
Episode consisting of seven classic deathmatch maps converted for single player (with speedrunning in mind):

dmc1m1 : basewalk (basewalk) by Preacher
dmc1m2 : Acrophobia (dm7) by (maybe) American McGee
dmc1m3 : Bloodrun (ztndm3) by ZTN
dmc1m4 : DeutschMaschine (cmt3) by Gandhi
dmc1m5 : Domination (p3a) by Pingu
dmc1m6 : #endif (endif) by Yataze
dmc1m7 : Lost Entrance to the Dismal Oubliette (e2m10) by John Romero

file.author: Connor Fitzgerald feat. Biff Debris, inertia, Evan Wagner, Kell
file.title: Deathmatch Classics Vol. 2
file.description:
Episode consisting of five classic deathmatch maps converted for single player (with speedrunning in mind):

dmc2m1 : Deadalus Revisited (imp1dm6) by Biff Debris
dmc2m2 : Slipstream (slip) by Inertia
dmc2m3 : Black Rain (evdm1) by Evan Wagner
dmc2m4 : The Killing Jar (kdmj) by Kell
dmc2m5 : Void Runner (kdmv) by Kell

file.author: negke feat. Lunaran, spirit, ShadoW, Vondur, Tyrann, R.P.G.
file.title: Deathmatch Classics Vol. 3
file.description:
Eight small deathmatch levels by various authors converted into an action-packed single player episode. Comes with a start map and a secret level. The GPL map sources are included.

dmc3 : Deathmatch Classics Vol.3 by negke
dmc3m1 : Orange Whip (lundm1) by Lunaran
dmc3m2 : Zeal & Fury (spirit1dm3) by spirit
dmc3m3 : Deep Scars (q1shw2) by ShadoW
dmc3m4 : Aghast (aghast) by Vondur
dmc3m5 : Devastation (q1shw1) by ShadoW
dmc3m6 : Dark Ritual (ritual) by Tyrann
dmc3m7 : /me Votes Vondur For World Domination (rpgdm1) by R.P.G.
dmc3m8 : Base Of Two Deaths (negdm1) by negke

Note: There is a progression stopping bug in dm3m8 - a hotfix is available here.
Additionally, two of the maps are incompatible with QW servers. Alternate versions of them are available here.

file.author: Unknown
file.title: Dark, Blue, Scary
file.description: Small and dark IKblue map.

file.author: ray (tigger-up-late)
file.title: dock 5
file.description: A small map. Originally a deathmatch map the author did place some monsters into it. Kinda nice to look at.

file.author: Sam Caldwell (ssaammwwe)
file.title: The Doghouse
file.description: Medium sized Metal/wood map with a slightly confusing, maze-like touch to it.

file.author: Fern (aka Fr3n)
file.title: 10,000 Feet Below
file.description:
Medium-sized underground temple with a unique Persian-like style. Preview/teaser for the upcoming DOM3 episode.

Note: This map requires Quoth and an engine port with increased limits.

file.author: Doom-pope
file.title: The Realm of Apocrypha
file.description: Small level featuring a blue underground castle. The map source is included.

file.author: Peter Lomax
file.title: Doom2 Map01 - Entryway
file.description: This level is a near 100% conversion with full Doom2 textures.

file.author: Swen Klemund
file.title: The Focus (Doom2 Map04)
file.description: Doom2 - Map04 converted for Quake with original textures.

file.author: Swen Klemund
file.title: Dead Simple (Doom2-Map07)
file.description: Doom2 - Map07 converted for Quake with original textures.

file.author: Swen Klemund
file.title: Tricks and Traps (Doom2-Map08)
file.description: Doom2 - Map08 converted for Quake with original textures.

file.author: unknown
file.title: Military Base
file.description: Direct conversion of E1M9 from DOOM, using original textures. The map source is included.

file.author: Jacob Fike
file.title: Doom Castle
file.description: Small Wizard castle with some ugly custom textures and Whaleboy's rain patch (optional).

file.author: Ben Glover
file.title: Return to Phobos
file.description:
Doom E1M7 ("Computer Station") rebuilt for Quake.

Note: This map requires Scourge of Armagon.

file.author: Erik Robson
file.title: I Wore My Doormat Face
file.description: About medium sized Metal map with a certain maze feel. Barely average.

file.author: J.F.Gustafsson
file.title: Episode 5: Dimension of the Past
file.description: Episode with nine small to medium-sized levels of various themes including a start map, a secret map, and a deathmatch arena. Also comes with three demos.

file.author: Thehuge
file.title: Dawn of the Dead
file.description: Quite large and fairly hard base map.

file.author: Dataram57
file.title: Deufel's Barracks
file.description:
Medium-sized medieval level for In the Shadows, featuring both stealth and regular gameplay. The map source is included.

Note: This map requires In the Shadows and a source port with BSP2 support.

file.author: Death Method
file.title: Lair Of The Dragon Ogre
file.description: A beautiful id metal castle in a nice style. A bit short.

file.author: Steve Rescoe
file.title: Drakopf
file.description: Two very small maps; one features the head of a dragon. Pointless.

file.author: Chris "Drannerz" Dransfield
file.title: Death waits
file.description: Medium sized zerstyle base/metal map. Quite hard.

file.author: Mark Wheeler
file.title: Drastic Falls
file.description:
Around medium map with a tree house, a waterfall canyon and a dam. Strange custom textures, rain, and new monsters: Snakeman, Bazooka babe, Drone, Blargs and Manga babes.
This file was repackaged by Spirit. You can find the original .zip in the trash

file.author: Mark Wheeler
file.title: Drastic Lodge
file.description: Small mansion in a dark forest, with complete custom texture set. "This pak uses Ultimate Weapons combo mod as a base and includes these monsters: Snakeman, Dragon, Raptor, Cyberdemon, Blarg, Spider, Grunts package, Femenforcer."

file.author: Mark Wheeler
file.title: Drastic Lodge
file.description: A small mansion with mostly new textures (e.g. from Doom) and no exit.

file.author: SavageX
file.title: The Dreaded Dreadbase of Dread
file.description: Medium-sized base map using FreeDoom textures. The map source is included.

file.author: Albert van Zyl
file.title: Dreary Disposition
file.description:
Large Wizard-themed medieval castle/dungeon level. The map source is included.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Marc Roussel
file.title: Enter the bloodfest DRUNK
file.description: A small to medium deathmatch map with one monster... Map source and a demo are included.

file.author: Dustin "Tronyn" Geeraert
file.title: Dry Sorrow
file.description:
Small medieval outpost with a unique texture theme and horde-based combat. A touched-up version of an old deathmatch map converted for SP mode. Comes with a custom skybox.

Note: This map requires the Drake mod.

file.author: Stan C.
file.title: The Downward Spiral
file.description: Small to medium Wizard/Metal map with waterfall canyon leading to a cave with an eddy, a temple and underground caverns. OK.

file.author: Nathan "De4thst4bber" Mills
file.title: Khanros Storage Facilty
file.description: Medium sized Base map with an almost endless story in the text file. Quite nice, apart from many poorly aligned textures.

file.author: Chris Holden, Greenwood, Nyoei, Pinchy, quasiotter, radiatoryang, RoosTer, Shadesmaster, Tintin
file.title: Doom Tintin Jam
file.description:
Community map pack: nine medium to large levels including a start map, using modified DOOM3 textures and running on the Arcane Dimensions mod (included). Also contains a few custom skyboxes and music tracks. Some map sources are included.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits + BSP2 support.

file.author: czg, OG, Yoder
file.title: Disconcerting Unease 2
file.description:
Four small to medium-sized spooky Halloween maps: an arctic outpost, a Q2-textured mining complex, a pumpkin spice latte franchise place, and an infinite horde arena. Comes with a few new features, a custom skybox and new sounds. The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits + BSP2 support.

file.author: Dunlop, Grawert, Oniscu, Yoder
file.title: Disconcerting Unease Speedmap Pack
file.description: Weekend-long impromptu speedmapping session: four around medium-sized metal levels. The map sources are included.

file.author: Sid
file.title: Dimension of the Dim
file.description: Small blue labyrinth filled with monsters. Rather pointless.

file.author: Doug Wheeler aka Bullseye8841
file.title: The Bizarre Bazaar
file.description: A marketplace-themed SP map of moderate size.

file.author: DeeDoubleU
file.title: ArcanBroomada Doctrina
file.description:
Medium-sized medieval outpost in a swampy hollow with a caves and a chapel. The map source is included.

Note: This map requires Arcane Dimensions 1.8 and a source port with increased limits.

file.author: James T. Hill
file.title: The Dwelling
file.description: Medium sized Wizard map.

file.author: AlekswithaK, Danz, Fairweather, Greenwood, h4724, JCR, khreathor, Markie Music, Mazu, Pinchy, PoolboyQ, VoidForce
file.title: Dwell - Episode 1 (Version 1.0)
file.description:
First episode of a four-episode project: nine medium to large Egyptian-themed levels including a start map. They are based on the Copper mod (included) and feature new monsters, weapons, sounds, skyboxes and custom music tracks. The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits + BSP2 support.
An updated version is available here.

file.author: AlekswithaK, Danz, Fairweather, Greenwood, h4724, JCR, khreathor, Markie Music, Mazu, Pinchy, PoolboyQ, VoidForce
file.title: Dwell - Episode 1 (Version 1.2)
file.description:
First episode of a four-episode project: nine medium to large Egyptian-themed levels including a start map. They are based on the Copper mod (included) and feature new monsters, weapons, sounds, skyboxes and custom music tracks. The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits + BSP2 support.

file.author: DeeDoubleU
file.title: Monster Training Facility
file.description: "Did you ever wondered what's it like to be a monster in quake? No? Well, I did. Small simple map which parodies Portal and The Stanley Parable. Save often!"

file.author: DeeDoubleU
file.title: Root of all Evil: Infernal Science (Part 1)
file.description:
Large underground research facility. Part 2 is available here.

Note: This map requires an engine port with increased limits.

file.author: DeeDoubleU
file.title: Root of all Evil: Infernal Science (Part 2)
file.description:
Second part of Root of all Evil. A large underground research facility.

Note: This map requires an engine port with increased limits.

file.author: DeeDoubleU
file.title: Secret
file.description: Small medieval-style fortress where all items are hidden in countless secrets which have to be discovered in order to survive.

file.author: Zied Rieke
file.title: Dextromethorphan
file.description: Small base map with a few outside areas, some nice-looking rooms and some bland ones. OK.

file.author: Zied Rieke
file.title: Dextromethrophan
file.description: Average base map. The final version or followup or sister map to dxm2. Looks and plays very similarly.

file.author: AxeMan & Dust
file.title: Pak 5
file.description: 6-map episode (incl. start map) consisting to a large degree of stuff ripped from other people's maps.

file.author: Lardarse (czg, Vondur)
file.title: Bloody Slipgates
file.description: E1M1rmx with a twist: a certain amount of red keys scattered throughout the map have to be collected in order to proceed, making the gameplay largely non-linear.

file.author: czg & Vondur
file.title: The Slipgate Duplex
file.description: Professionally constructed remake of E1M1 with some additional areas. Map sources are included.

file.author: Speedy (czg & Vondur)
file.title: The Slipgate Duplex HARDCORE
file.description:
Harder version of e1m1rmx with additional monsters, route and gameplay changes. The difficulty is intensified by several items dropping out. :P
Map source is included.

file.author: RickyT23
file.title: The Slipgate Massacre
file.description:
Remix/remake of the original E1M1 - The Slipgate Complex, but larger and more spacious, with many new and expanded areas.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits.

file.author: id & huanlopan
file.title: Gloom Keep [Drake remix]
file.description:
Modified version of the original E1M5- Gloom Keep featuring enemies and items from the Drake mod. The map source is included.

Note: This map requires Drake and a source port with increased limits (due to the mod).
[Currently cannot be run through the Quake Injector]

file.author: Ankh
file.title: Back To Gloom Keep
file.description: Quake's Gloom Keep (e1m5) reworked for Quoth. Nice effects and brutally hard. The GPL map source is included.

file.author: Kell
file.title: Gloomier Keep
file.description:
Knave-style remix/remake of E1M5 / Gloom Keep.

Note: This map requires Quoth.

file.author: Ubiquitous
file.title: Of Three Plantagenets
file.description:
Three-map mini episode in a dark medieval theme. It has an extra start map and features a few modifications, some new sounds, models and textures.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits and BSP2 support.
An updated version is available here.

file.author: John Romero
file.title: Lost Entrance of the Dismal Oubliette
file.description:
"This was the original starting point of the Dismal Oubliette, e2m6. It was cut for size reasons since it made the .BSP file go way over our self-imposed 1.4mb limit." - "Winding, dripping cave entrance"
Map source is included.

file.author: John Romero
file.title: Lost Entrance of the Dismal Oubliette [transparent water]
file.description:
Transparent water version of e2m10, the "original starting point of the Dismal Oubliette, e2m6."
Map source is included.

file.author: dumptruck_ds & id Software
file.title: Ebon Fortress Remix
file.description: Slightly touched-up version of the original map E2M4 - Ebon Fortress, adding small gameplay tweaks and subtle colored lighting. It runs on the progsdump mod (included) and comes with a custom music track in two formats created by the author. The map and mod sources are included.

file.author: rj
file.title: The Lizard's Trance
file.description: A remix of id's e2m5 in Q3 gothic textures and bigger scale. Beautiful architecture and solid gameplay.

file.author: Andy "Liger" Patrizio
file.title: Earthworld
file.description: Small to medium Wizard brick/rock dungeon.

file.author: Geoff Barry
file.title: Earthbound
file.description: Medium sized Wizard map with some sort of temple, tight and clippy underground water caverns and slightly confusing gameplay.

file.author: eber150
file.title: Slipgate to a Lost Dimension
file.description:
A small single classic-style map inspired by id base maps but with some eldritch monsters. The author's first release. Map source is included.

"i'm from argentina and i started mapping for quake because the atmosphere and the mood of the game feels amazing, i didn't want to start with something crazy so i made a base map"

file.author: Martel DuVigneaud
file.title: Ebony
file.description: Small metal map.

file.author: J.F.Gustafsson
file.title: Empedokles Domain
file.description: Medium sized Wizard level.

file.author: Vondur
file.title: Elements
file.description: Medium-sized medival level with distinctly themed areas for each element, and classic gameplay. A skybox and the map source are included.

file.author: efdat
file.title: The Place of Dismay
file.description: Around medium sized red brick/metal mountain base map.

file.author: Stylaphone
file.title: Escape from Quakertraz
file.description: Small to medium-sized base-style prison level. Comes with a skill-selection map.

file.author: Scott "Gemein" Perry
file.title: Egany
file.description: Medium-sized dark metal/medieval dungeon with a few jumping bits.

file.author: Qmaster
file.title: Egyptoagula
file.description:
Large Egyptian-themed space map with floating pyramids, oases and traps. It runs on the Keep mod and includes a patch for it as well as the qc source.

Note: This map requires the Keep mod and a source port with increased limits.
[Cannot be run through the Quake Injector]

file.author: David Jewsbury
file.title: Electric Sheep
file.description: Three small "cyberpunk"-themed levels with weird construction and mixed texture styles.

file.author: Ludovic Texier
file.title: EldenCross
file.description: Small Metal map.

file.author: Erik Robson
file.title: Electric Company
file.description: Large, kind of plain realistic map: an eletric company infested by fast dogs and evil spiders.

file.author: ELEK
file.title: Episode 3 The Tides of War
file.description:
A small episode for Nehahra. Starts in a base, then goes into a dark moody mountain theme.

[This file was repackaged by Spirit. You can find the original .zip here]

file.author: Andrew Smith
file.title: The Elektra Complex
file.description: Medium sized Metal/Ebon style map. Very nice, but too easy due to a surplus of ammo and health.

file.author: Al Conrad
file.title: Elementals
file.description: Around medium sized map with a sort of novelty theme: The player has to complete four distinct areas representing each element - earth, water, air, fire. Somewhat interesting, though the map is of average build quality with quite confusing progression.

file.author: Roger Staines
file.title: Elsinore
file.description: Medium to large Wizard castle.

file.author: Rob Marton (nn6)
file.title: El temple del sol
file.description: Large temple with a unique metal theme, some reskinned monsters, an interesting boss fight, and a start map.

file.author: Dave Kelvin
file.title: The Wherehouse
file.description: A small brown metal floater, feels more like a DOOM map.

file.author: SnAzBaZ
file.title: Emolt Quanta
file.description: Very small metal map.

file.author: Jim Strider
file.title: Empire
file.description: Large, plain, orange multiple-story building.

file.author: dumptruck_ds
file.title: The End of Solace
file.description:
Large moldy blood dungeon "in the style of E1M3". The map source is included.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits.

file.author: marty
file.title: End of time
file.description: Small to medium sized Base level.

file.author: Bal, Fairweather, FifthElephant, Greenwood, JCR, JPal, Markie Music, Nolcoz, Rhoq, ZungryWare
file.title: Epochs of Enmity
file.description:
Episode with 10 around medium-sized levels plus small start/end/credits maps in various themes, including bases, temples, citadels, towns and dungeons. The goal was to create an "unofficial 6th episode" similar to DOPA. The levels are based on the Progs_dump mod (included) and feature some additional content like models, skyboxes and custom music tracks (in OGG format).

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits + BSP2 support.
A hotfix for a progression stopper on eoe7 (only occurs on easy skill) is available here.

file.author: Andrew Smith
file.title: The Epoch Turning
file.description: Large Wizard map with caverns and a Base bit.

file.author: Matt Joiner
file.title: Erkle's Domain
file.description: Very small and very bad/pointless Wizard map.

file.author: marty
file.title: Horror Erotique
file.description: Small Metal level.

file.author: The Harb!ngeR of Fish
file.title: Escape
file.description: Mini-campaign with six small (mostly) IKBase maps, lots of rats and a 'fishy' boss battle. Escape out of a prison cell and fight your way through the enemy base.

file.author: Gonzoj
file.title: Escape
file.description: Small to medium 'realism' prism escape map.

file.author: ET
file.title: Et's Level Of HELL
file.description: Very small Wizard level. Pointless.

file.author: Anders Gustavsson
file.title: The Evil Town
file.description: Medium sized realistic map with custom textures. OK.

file.author: E.T. [Etienne Rheaume]
file.title: E.T.'s World
file.description: Smallish poorly constructed Wizard map.

file.author: JPL
file.title: Event Horizon
file.description: Big base map in Daikatana textures with objective-based gameplay.

file.author: Vidar Ermesjo (aka Saboteur/Nagel)
file.title: Evil Army
file.description: Very small, leaked Base map. One room with crates, three monsters.

file.author: Steve Rescoe
file.title: EvilDead cabin
file.description: A small cabin with a basement in a dark forest, inspired by the Evil Dead movies (originally created for the never completed Army of Darkness TC). Map source is included.

file.author: Willem (Warren Marshall)
file.title: Evil Exhumed
file.description: Medium sized Base map with an excarvation site, a library and a secret lab. This file was repackaged by Spirit. You can find the original .zip in the trash

file.author: Glenn Ancheta
file.title: The EvilPool
file.description: Small, bland and leaked Wizard map with underwater areas.

file.author: Matt Sefton
file.title: EvilWorld 1
file.description: Medium sized Metal level with a pyramid. OK.

file.author: Evan Wagner
file.title: A Subtle Dagger
file.description: Medium sized Metal level.

file.author: eXeler0
file.title: Area32x
file.description:
Large base level with Half-Life-inspired style and textures.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits.

file.author: PuLSaR, sock
file.title: Explore Jam 1
file.description:
Two small maps made over two days. Gameplay is experimental and focuses solely on exploration and finding the way to progress. There are no monsters and no serious threats to the player.

The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require an engine with skybox support.

file.author: Bloughsburgh, Naitelveni, NewHouse, PuLSaR, topher
file.title: Explore Jam 2
file.description:
Second "explore" map jam - featuring five smallish levels in different themes and with experimental gameplay. No combat; instead, the focus is on exploration and solving puzzles or discovering secrets. The pack comes with two skyboxes, custom medievel-style item visuals, and the map sources are included.

Note: These maps require an engine port with increased limits.

file.author: Taskmaster
file.title: Eye Socket
file.description: Nicely built map with good gameplay. The only drawback is the very straight-forward type of play, the map won't take an experienced quaker more than 5 minutes.

file.author: Lukasxd
file.title: Full of Boxes
file.description: Small base map.

file.author: james4040
file.title: Factory 969
file.description: Large bland Base map with nonlinear gameplay. A deathmatch map with single player settings, easy to get lost in. Barely average.

file.author: sock
file.title: Fallen from Grace (the castle)
file.description:
Small medieval map, set in a courtyard and surrounding buildings.

An expanded version of Sock's map from Retro Jam 1, featuring bug fixes, a skill selection section, additional areas and gameplay, and more secrets than the original version of the map.

file.author: Richard Dale Carlson
file.title: Fane of the Diabolist
file.description: Small, slightly confusing Wizard map. Barely average.

file.author: Team Phoenix
file.title: Fantasy Quake - Rise of the Phoenix
file.description:
Total conversion with almost new everything. Around 20 SP maps in varying medieval/ fantasy themes and 4 DM maps; multiple player classes to choose from, new weapons, new enemies, etc.

"A totally total total conversion - pure fantasy style. A lot of maps with a great sense of exploration and discovery. This TC has new everything, and most of it is very good, though occasionally the new stuff can look a bit shoddy. There are some very cool details, and everything has a sense of fitting in well with the TC as a whole. Gameplay and maps are very different from Quake (which can take some getting used to), and usually very good - this is a most worthwhile TC."
- TEAMShambler

Note: A patch is available here

file.author: Tiddles
file.title: Fatal Error
file.description: Small rusty base map.

file.author: Massimo Ciano
file.title: The Fatal Place
file.description: Medium size metal castle.

file.author: super
file.title: Fatal Steps
file.description: Very small runic-style cathedral.

file.author: Trinca
file.title: Freaky base
file.description: A pretty big and hard base map. The map source is included.

file.author: Jason Fischer aka ThreeD
file.title: Fast Break
file.description: Small plain lava canyon with a tint of base.

file.author: Darren Stabler
file.title: The Forsaken Citadel
file.description: Medium sized boxed Ebon-style map with some outdoor areas.

file.author: Robert "Fat Controller" Cruickshank
file.title: Ontranto
file.description: Five map episode set in a medieval fantasy world, with many custom textures, a few new monsters and some other QC: starting in a dark swamp, the player has to travel through caverns and temples to a ship bringing him to the town of Ontranto, where he is to battle the Duke.

file.author: G.Pietz (Laernu)
file.title: Fearless Dissension, Chapter I
file.description: Medium sized Wizard castle. Map source is included. Barely average.

file.author: Iceman
file.title: From Dark to Dune
file.description: Wtf mod of the year?! Two very small maps (two small rooms each) with easily gibbable Zombies (Fiends).

file.author: Jay Vanover
file.title: Fear No Fall
file.description: Medium sized Wizard/Metal dungeon with lots of water/lava.

file.author: czg
file.title: Februus Depth
file.description: Large underground catacomb level.

file.author: FifthElephant
file.title: Q-Deck
file.description:
Small, highly-detailed base map. The (expanded) singleplayer version of DMQDeck. The map source is included.

Note: This map requires an engine port with increased limits.

file.author: Andy "Liger" Patrizio
file.title: Fireworld
file.description: Small to medium lava caverns.

file.author: baby111485
file.title: First
file.description: Crap.

file.author: Ondrejoda
file.title: Begining, The MiniBase, The Temple
file.description: Three tiny beginner's levels. The map sources are included.

file.author: Lilith/raven33
file.title: FirstCoolMap
file.description:
Small base level. The map source is included.
[Cannot be run through the Quake Injector]

file.author: Jaeon
file.title: The Fish Factory
file.description: Large fish factory combining several texture themes. The map source is included.

file.author: Unknown
file.title: Untitled
file.description: About medium sized, leaked Medieval/Metal/mix map.

file.author: Justin Fleck
file.title: Azure Influx
file.description: Around medium sized linear b/w Metal map. OK.

file.author: Jay Vanover
file.title: Flee
file.description: Mini campaign with three small-to-medium Wizard/Metal maps and a start map. The custom progs.dat slightly modifies some monsters and adds more gore.

file.author: Shaun [Kona] Ross
file.title: Carved in Flesh
file.description:
"Three unique new levels as you make your way across nightlit terrain and enter an epic gothic castle. A very fresh theme created with Fakk2 and Quake3 textures.
A partial conversion with ten new custom monsters and three powerful new weapons all of high quality. Alongside this beastiary almost all Quake monsters have been modified, either with a new skin, improved AI or a new arsenal."
Truely awesome brushwork, modifications and gameplay.

file.author: Florian Gleixner
file.title: Flo's 1st Map
file.description: Small Medieval beginner map.

file.author: Stephen "The Viper" Peterson
file.title: FLSMAP: Combat Education
file.description: Small to medium-sized crude recreation of the author's school with many rooms in long corridors, a gym, a basement and a front yard.

file.author: Phil Hammond
file.title: Flyer
file.description: Very small, plain and dark base map.

file.author: Mike Woodham
file.title: For My Babies
file.description: Medium sized dark Wizard/Metal map. OK.

file.author: Mike Woodham & Tronyn
file.title: A Roaming Wildebeest In Spain
file.description:
"Based on Tronyn's scrapped Roman Wilderness of Pain maps, this level represents another sort of Metagyptian environment. It abounds with typical Quake monster fights and should give an experienced Quaker about 25 minutes of good quality fraggin'."
A large open Egyptian temple framed by mountains. Nice.

file.author: Mike Woodham
file.title: For My Babies Two
file.description:
Easy map with a mixture of styles (medieval, wizardish, swamp), created by splicing together two pre-existing dm maps, by Jim Lowell and Viper respectively.

From the readme: I have taken two existing deathmatch levels, joined them, used prefabs from various sources and 'created' a 'new' level. All I really did was place some monsters, so if it doesn't work, blame me not them.

file.author: Mike Woodham
file.title: For My Babies 3
file.description: Big wizmetal map, starts off with some grunts in a canyon. Comes with a start map.

file.author: Mike Woodham
file.title: For My Babies 4
file.description: Huge green swampy map.

file.author: Sloppy Jaloppy & Mike Woodham
file.title: For My Babies 5
file.description: Mike Woodham fixed and improved an old map by Sloppy Jaloppy. Yellow brick (like dm1) medieval.

file.author: Mike Woodham
file.title: For My Babies 6
file.description: Medium sized Metal map with some base monsters and a Base generator room. Nice.

file.author: Mike Woodham
file.title: Fmb7 - Ambush Keen Pilgrims
file.description: This is Pingu's beautiful deathmatch maps A2 and Daydream converted into a singleplayer adventure.

file.author: Mike Woodham & Tronyn
file.title: For My Babies 8
file.description:
"Based on Tronyn's Runezig map, this level represent a sort of Metagyptian environment."
Medium to large Egyptian temple.

file.author: Mike Woodham
file.title: This Onion
file.description: Large medieval castle in an underground cave with DKTe3 textures, a couple of new monsters and (optional) background music.

file.author: Mike Woodham
file.title: For My Babies - Bin Dunne Gorne 2
file.description:
A sprawling, underground castle clad in Daikatana E3 textures, with interesting progression, difficult secrets, new monsters, music, and a couple of other new features. Both a sequel and an update to This Onion.

Note: These maps require an engine port with increased limits.

file.author: Franz Obermeier
file.title: Obi's Quake World
file.description: Medium sized Wizard/Medieval castle with a yard, a chapel, some dark corridors and lots of action. OK.

file.author: J.F.Gustafsson
file.title: From out of nowhere
file.description: Small metal map.

file.author: Colossus
file.title: Forsaken
file.description:
A medium / large Runic themed classic-style map with some pretty big encounters. The author's first release.

"Gameplay is tricky and combat heavy, would recommend playing on one difficulty lower than what you normally do. Nightmare is possible but not fair. :)"

Contains custom music by the author. Uses Copper mod (already included) but no custom start map or built-in difficulty select, so select your difficulty manually via "skill #" in console, and load the map manually via "map forsaken" in console.

Note: this is version 2 with fixed monster placement, texture alignment, and music.

Note: due to high monster count, probably requires a modern engine / source port with increased limits.

file.author: JPL
file.title: Fort Driant
file.description:
A huge military base in Half-Life/Doom style. The mission is to disable a reactor within. Comes with a few ambient sounds and a custom skybox.

Note: This map requires Quoth and a source port with increased limits.
A fully-vised version of the map is available here.

file.author: JPL
file.title: Fort Driant
file.description:
Updated (fully vised) version of Fort Driant which improves the rendering performance.

Note: This map requires Quoth, the original release and a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Addy / TheADrain
file.title: Fortress Interior
file.description:
Large classic-style mountain base map. Map source is included.

"This is my first single player map, I really hope you enjoy it :) I would love any feedback on the design!"

Note: probably requires a modern engine / source port with increased limits.

file.author: Madfox
file.title: FourFeather
file.description:
Large mixed theme map set in a partly technological, party runic and partly medieval complex. Features plenty of new custom content, including a large variety of new monsters.

Note: This map requires an engine port with increased limits and skybox support.

file.author: Martin Fuchsr
file.title: Foxyzoo
file.description: A tiny arena map to showcase four of the author's favorite custom monsters: Willy the spider, the manga babe, the snakeman and the bazooka babe.

file.author: Fern (aka Fr3n)
file.title: Necromanicide
file.description: A nicely made egyptian remix of Quake's e1m3 - The Necropolis.

file.author: Fern (aka Fr3n)
file.title: The Grand Guignol
file.description: Originally designed for speedrunning this map is fun for everyone. Dressed in Sock's egyptian textures.

file.author: Juha Koiste
file.title: The Forbidden Base
file.description: Small Base map. Around id quality.

file.author: Robert Carter
file.title: Fear Castle v.2
file.description: Still cramped second version of frcastle - a very small Wizard castle for DM/SP.

file.author: Robert Carter
file.title: Fear Castle
file.description: Very small, cramped DM/SP castle in Wizard-style.

file.author: Pete Burrows
file.title: From Hell
file.description: Around medium sized map - an attempt at recreating "the squalid east end of London of the Victorian era a time of gas lamp shadows alleyways and the worlds first serial killer" (Jack the Ripper).

file.author: George Grotans
file.title: Fun! Happy Birthday !!
file.description:
This is more fun than birthday and Christmas on one day!!!!!!112
This file was repackaged by Spirit. You can find the original .zip in the trash

file.author: ArrrCee, digs, DOOMer, ericw, FifthElephant, ionous/mfx, mechtech, onetruepurple, RickyT23, Scampie, skacky, sock
file.title: Func Map Jam 1 - Honey Theme
file.description:
Map jam #1 - a community project at Func_Msgboard. The pack features 12 Honey-themed maps of varying sizes. It comes with a couple of modified models. The map sources are included.

Note: Some of the maps require an engine port with increased limits.

file.author: Cocerello, ericw / FifthElephant, Lunaran, mfx, Scampie, skacky, sock, Tronyn
file.title: Func Map Jam 2 - IKblue/IKwhite Theme
file.description:
Map jam #2 - a community project at Func_Msgboard. The pack features 8 medium to large ikblue / ikwhite-themed maps. It comes with a couple of modified models and custom skyboxes. The map sources are included.

Note: Some of the maps require an engine port with increased limits.

file.author: DaZ, ericw, ionous, mfx, Tronyn, scar3crow
file.title: Func Map Jam 3 - Zerstörer theme
file.description:
Map jam #3 - a community project at Func_Msgboard. The pack features 6 small to large Zerstörer-themed maps. The complete Zer mod is included in this release, and so are the map sources.

Note: Some of these maps require an engine port with increased limits and support for fog.
A hotfix for mfx's map is available here.

file.author: FifthElephant, Rapowke
file.title: Func Map Jam 4 - Low Gravity Runic Theme
file.description: Map jam #4 - a community project at Func_Msgboard. The pack features 2 low gravity runic maps. The map sources are included.

file.author: Arrrcee, FifthElephant, Hypnos, ijed, mfx, Scampie, Skacky, WarrenM
file.title: Func Map Jam 5 - The Qonquer Map Jam
file.description:
Map jam #5 - a community project at Func_Msgboard.

The pack features a start map and 8 maps of various themes made for WarrenM's Qonquer mod (included), which lets the player fight waves of monsters in arena-style maps, with the occasional assistance of minions. The theme for this jam was originally "Prisons of the underworld".

The map sources are included.

This file was repackaged by Spirit, the qcc/.DS_Store file was removed and the source/zerstörer.wad filename updated. You can find the original zip in the trash/ directory.

file.author: Bloughsburgh, Breezeep, DelusionalBear, dumptruck_ds, G1ftmacher, Haunter, Ionous, Kell, Mukor, Naitelveni, NewHouse, onetruepurple, Pulsar, ShoTro, skacky
file.title: Func Map Jam 9 - Contract Revoked / Knave theme
file.description:
Func Map Jam #9 - a community project at Func_Msgboard. This pack features 15 Contract Revoked / Knave-themed levels of varying sizes. It comes with a start map and many custom models, sounds and skyboxes. The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require Quoth 2.2 and a source port with increased limits & BSP2 support as well as the -quoth command line switch.

This is an updated version of the pack which contains some bug fixes.

file.author: Artistical, Bloodshot, Fairweather, ionous, KalebClark, JCR, Mafon, Mazu, Naitelveni, NewHouse, Pinchy Skree, Strangework, Ukko, Yoder
file.title: Func Map Jam X - Insomnia Theme
file.description:
Tenth community mapping jam: 14 Insomnia-themed levels plus a start map. It comes with a couple of custom skyboxes, sounds and music tracks. The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits and BSP2 support.

file.author: Bal, Breezeep, dumptruck_ds, FifthElephant, ionous, ItEndsWithTens, mukor, Naitelveni, negke, Pritchard, Redfield
file.title: Xmas Jam 2017 - 1024³ theme
file.description:
Func Xmas Jam 2017 - a community project at Func_Msgboard. This pack features 11 small AD maps in varied styles where all gameplay takes place within a 1024x1024x1024 space. It comes with a few custom skyboxes, sounds, and a music track. The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require Arcane Dimensions 1.60 or later and a source port with increased limits.

file.author: MadFox
file.title: TinRope
file.description: Medium to large, plain, dark cavern map with some Metal bits. Barely average.

file.author: Phil Hammond
file.title: FunRun
file.description: Small teleporter hub something. Barely average.

file.author: nolcoz
file.title: Forgotten Valley
file.description:
Turok-themed levels with custom textures. Comes with a music track and the map source is included.

Note: These map require Quoth.

file.author: Fairweather
file.title: A Quick Trip to the Old World
file.description: Small 768*768 speedmap. The map source is included.

file.author: DEAD MEAT
file.title: The Gallery Of The Mind
file.description: Small, poorly constructed, boxed mix-texture pseudo gallery displaying some of Michael Whelan's artwork. Only one monster. Comes with a demo.

file.author: Unknown
file.title: The Garrison
file.description: Medium-sized plain Metal level with base monsters. Lots of ammo there, but no weapons.

file.author: GatorMan
file.title: GatorMan's Diversion
file.description: Medium to large, fairly plain, linear Medieval map.

file.author: goldenboy
file.title: Palace Revolution
file.description: A former speedmap. Medievalish and with a twist in the end dedicated to the Func_Msgboard.

file.author: Gemein
file.title: Gem Church
file.description:
Detailed recreation of a gothic stone church ("from somewhere? in Canada") with no monsters or gameplay, intended more as a mapping exercise / study rather than a playable level.

"I only had the jpg as reference, and some things are not perfect, and I had to make up the inside, but overall it turned out to my liking."

Note: may require a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Astaroth (Rob Ellis II)
file.title: Genetix Facility
file.description: Medium sized, somewhat ugly Base map with non-linear gameplay. Map source is included.

file.author: Roger Staines
file.title: Ghost Town
file.description: Medium sized wild west ghost town with two different game modes depending on the selected skill level.

file.author: Chris Holden
file.title: Green Hale
file.description: Small green temple map using a custom texture set. It also features a custom skybox and the map source is included.

file.author: Matt Joiner
file.title: Tall PolyEd Level
file.description: Small, ugly Wizard/blue brick level "made made to show off the capabilities of PolyEd."

file.author: Dick Nelson
file.title: Giblet Central
file.description: Small to medium plain Medieval map.

file.author: Ed Cope
file.title: The Gib Factory
file.description:
Medium sized factory level with a few new textures, monsters (e.g. Drone and Cyberdemon) and weapons. OKish.
This file was repackaged by Spirit. You can find the original .zip in the trash

file.author: Fred Hite,Jr (DEVIANT)
file.title: The Gibplex
file.description: Medium sized Wizard/ Medieval map with a few new textures. Barely average.

file.title: REoL TOUGH: Demise! (watervised)
file.description:
Small (boxed) metal level.
Transparent-water-vised version of 4fiffy1

file.description:

file.description:
Small wizard level.
Only just OKish.

file.description:
Medium sized wizard.
Only just OKish.

file.description:
Medium sized base level.
Bleh.

file.description:
Medium sized base level.
Bleh.

file.author: Unknown
file.title: Abandon All Hope
file.description: Very small, plain red brick map.

file.author: Sean Reed
file.title: Loupus' Gloom
file.description: Medium sized fairly plain Metal map with a Wizard brick bit and a Base-style train.

file.author: aDaya
file.title: A Once Glorious City
file.description:
Large temple complex using Egyptian textures from Rogue/Q1MP2, featuring somewhat nonlinear gameplay. The map source and a few texture wads are included.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Howard "GlassMan" Shaw
file.title: Colony
file.description: Huge and very detailed space colony level with custom textures, new monsters such as Shock Troopers and Battle Mechs, as well as some other additional progs.

file.author: Howard "GlassMan" Shaw
file.title: Day of the Lords
file.description:
Large ancient castle with custom textures, great details and atmosphere.

(A version compiled for supporting transparent water is available here: gmsp3tw)

file.author: Howard "GlassMan" Shaw
file.title: Day of the Lords [transparent water]
file.description: This is the "transparent water" version of gmsp3.

file.author: Dustin "Tronyn" Geeraert
file.title: The Goblin City
file.description:
Medium sized medieval village, invaded and partially destroyed by nail-shooting goblins.

The map was later re-used in Soul of Evil.

file.author: Jussi Tuononen
file.title: God's House
file.description: Large red brick map. OKish.

file.author: Tim Elek
file.title: Castle Golgotha
file.description: Two medium sized Metal/Wizard maps and a start map.

file.author: Potsy aka (Jim Hughes)
file.title: Gods of Rapture
file.description: Medium to large Wizard map. OK.

file.author: O. Marlowe
file.title: Gordian's Brick
file.description: Medium sized red brick realism map with a Wizard bit beneath. OK.

file.author: Unknown
file.title: The Hockey Arena
file.description: Medium-sized cramped mixed-texture dungeon with an ice hockey arena.

file.author: Gotshun
file.title: The "lost" levels
file.description:
Classic singleplayer campaign made by Gotshun that was never finished or released: Two episodes with 16 levels of various themes including a start map and a secret map. The second episode lacks a conclusion/boss fight due to the unfinished nature of the pack, but it is perfectly playable.

Note: These levels require Scourge of Armagon.

file.author: Qmaster
file.title: Cubes of Brown
file.description: Small blocky level textured almost entirely in brown bricks. The author states it was built with Legos first, then mapped.

file.author: Daya
file.title: GravelPit
file.description:
Medium-sized base-style map, based on the Team Fortress 2 level "Gravel Pit". It uses a mix of idbase and Quake II textures. The author's first Quake map.

Note: This map requires Quoth and an engine port with support for colored lighting and skyboxes.

This file was repackaged by Spirit. You can find the original .zip in the trash.

file.author: Mike Ruete / 'Gripp'
file.title: Rust in Peace
file.description:
Medium sized original Metal-style windtunnel base map.

"Impressive architecture with an unusual use of the metal style, exciting stop/start play." - TEAMShambler

file.author: Andrew Smith
file.title: The Grim Outpost
file.description:
Large Wizard-/Episode 2-themed fortress.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits and BSP2 support.
[rezipped for Quaddicted]

file.author: MadFox
file.title: Grunt Grenadin
file.description: Mixture of base and medieval elements. This map is huge and challenging.

file.author: GunSgtHighway
file.title: Adoria
file.description:
Two base maps: a space ship hangar and a huge UAC facility with labs, tech areas, offices, personel quarters and a cantina. It attempts to connect Wolfenstein, Doom and Quake. It runs on the Progs_dump mod (included), uses many new textures, and comes with additional assets, a custom skybox and music tracks in WAV format.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits + BSP2 support. Additionally, due to the large filesize of the skybox and music, the memory heapsize must be increased. A smaller version of the skybox is available here.

file.author: GunSgtHighway
file.title: GSH Jungle mod
file.description:
Small military camp in the jungle. An asset showcase and a resource/toolbox for vegetation in levels. It is based on the Progs_dump mod (included), uses custom textures and comes with a few new sounds. The map and qc sources are included.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits + BSP2 support as well as transparent textures. Perfomance issues on slower machines are to be expected.

file.author: GunSgtHighway
file.title: Temple of doom
file.description: The first map by GunSgtHighway.

file.author: JPL
file.title: The Gateway to Hell
file.description:
Small to medium-sized medieval / hell map, the sequel to Castle of the Dark Ages. Uses DKT and Doom3 textures, and comes with a few additional ambient sounds as well as a hell skybox.

Note: This map requires Quoth and an engine port with increased limits.

file.author: Andrew Smith
file.title: The Guardhouse
file.description: Medium sized detailed Metal level with base and medieval monsters. Comes with a start map. Unnecessarily released as a PAK.

file.author: Shaun [Kona] Ross
file.title: Guncotton
file.description:
"Guncotton is an industrial/base styled two map pack (and start map). Architecturally very detailed, the maps are woven in modified Q2 Waste textures (MXoxide) and Than's Industrial set. Both levels are small but pack a punch with modified Grunts and Enforcers among the other Quake monsters. Enforcers have improved firepower, and Grunts now lay out the punishment with a strong arsenal of different weapons and new skins, also used in Nihilore."
Awesome maps and pretty cool monster modifications!

file.author: Kevin Gwartney (GunnerMan)
file.title: Undergraves
file.description: About medium sized, cramped blue brick/ Wizard zombie dungeon. Comes with a start map. OK.

file.author: Tom Cleghorn
file.title: Castell Y Gwynt
file.description: Medium sized, somewhat cramped Medieval castle. OKish.

file.author: Brian Ball
file.title: Halo of Fire (Leap of Faith)
file.description: Medium sized Wizard map with a mine bit leading through a waterfall canyon. There are many deadly traps, so frequent quicksaving is recommended.

file.author: Brian Morgan (Duley)
file.title: Harm's Way
file.description: Medium sized clean Base map hosting a genetic experiments facility.

file.author: Tiarnan Breffni
file.title: Haunted Revenge
file.description: Largish somewhat plain Wizard fortress.

file.author: GreenHornet aka., Steven Anderson
file.title: The Haunted Mansion
file.description: Medium sized, boxed / poorly constructed, confusing, plain Medieval building with a graveyard outside.

file.author: Shaun [Kona] Ross
file.title: Autumn Haunting
file.description:
Your battle after Carved In Flesh continues in this sequel. A contrasting dark medieval castle full of unfamiliar foe."
A medium sized mountain castle/church and a small boss battle arena using DKTe3 textures with around ten new or modified monsters and three new weapons.

file.author: Malcolm Sailor (aka hayduke)
file.title: Ephermerality
file.description:
Small Metal level.

Note: there is no gold key, the intended way over the GK bars is a rocket jump.

file.author: Nicolas "hexcalk" Maeder
file.title: Peripheral Fundament
file.description: Small mostly base-style beginner map. The map source is included.

file.author: Nicolas "hexcalk" Maeder
file.title: Implo1t Dys3ngage
file.description: Very small Japanese shrine using Daikatana textures. The map source is included. Barely average.

file.author: Nicolas "hexcalk" Maeder
file.title: Baneful Politic Comply
file.description: Small medieval/Wizard-style level. The map source is included. Barely average.

file.author: Nicolas "hexcalk" Maeder
file.title: SurveylLance ZtateMent
file.description: Small tp-industrial-textured base map. The map source is included.

file.author: Mazu
file.title: Awoken Madness
file.description:
Huge metal/runic fortress built into the mountains, with a high monster count. The map source is included.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Ankh
file.title: Hangover Devastation
file.description: Medium sized gray-red castle, created with trickjumping in mind. Comes with an optional skybox.

file.author: Roger Staines
file.title: Hellbase
file.description: Medium sized Base map with Wizard bits.

file.author: PuLSaR
file.title: The HELLbridge
file.description: Large blue metal/brick map.

file.author: JPL
file.title: Hatchepsout: The Hell Temple
file.description: Small to medium Egyptian temple. OKish.

file.author: Juha Koiste
file.title: Hell's Castle
file.description: Medium sized Medieval castle with some blue and gray brick bits. OK.

file.author: kukkye
file.title: Hellhole
file.description: Small base map that requires rocket/trick jumping to progress.

file.author: Rickard Edén & Greenwood
file.title: Hell Revisited
file.description: Retextured version of Hell with a bit of colored lighting added and a few missing items fixed.

file.author: Elvis
file.title: Hell's Village
file.description: Small village map for SP and DM with Wizard textures and dull lighting.

file.author: Here
file.title: hyperevolt
file.description: Short q3gothic map with a somewhat deathmatch-like layout/feeling.

file.author: Here
file.title: Bull on Parade
file.description: Straight-forward q3base -> clean medieval map. Has some nice visuals and good (but short) gameplay.

file.author: Here
file.title: The Castle of Pain
file.description: Quite promising beta map. Clearly beta quality though as it is quite unbalanced (and badly lit). Fun to play.

file.author: Here
file.title: Beyond the Black Sun
file.description: Large white Indian temple-ish map with all new textures.

file.author: Heresy
file.title: Dismal Signal
file.description:
Medium-sized lava-industrial facility on a desert planet, using custom textures. It comes with a custom skybox and the map source is included.

Note: This map requires a source port with increased limits. Additionally, the files and folders need to be renamed in order to work with case-sensitive operating systems.

file.author: Scragbait
file.title: Fall Cleaning
file.description: Small to medium mansion with constant monster teleports and some arena combat situations, produced for Tronyn's Halloween Haunted House mapping exercise.

file.author: Levelord
file.title: Hipside
file.description: Small orange base map, made for Computer Gaming World magazine. The map source is included. OK.

file.author: Chris Mayers
file.title: Hive, part I
file.description:
Medium sized Wizard/Base map.

"Unusual base map, varied architecture, quite engrossing, plenty of weaponry." - TEAMShambler

file.author: negke
file.title: Home sweet home
file.description: negke's first level - the obligatory "my home" map.

file.author: czg
file.title: Honey
file.description: Two cleverly designed maps with massive scale and thick atmosphere, using an expanded cistern texture set. Standard Quake gameplay with several enhancements and surprises. Includes a start/outro map and a bonus credits map. QC and map sources are included.

file.author: Eblan Bush
file.title: Horror Wonderful
file.description: Small to medium-sized plain beginner's map using mixed texture themes.

file.author: Noel Weer
file.title: Horripalatia
file.description:
"A metal level built around a solid copper texture theme" that kind of feels like a DOOM map.

Note: This map requires Scourge of Armagon.

file.author: Richard Neff
file.title: Halls of Horrors
file.description: Small medieval castle with a few custom textures, designed for the Deathmatch Maker Competition '97. Comes with an additional skill selection map. The DMM map sources are included.

file.author: J.F.Gustafsson
file.title: F**king hostile
file.description: Medium wizard level in E1M2 style.

file.author: Andrew Turner
file.title: Hotel Kique-Asse
file.description: Very small hotel-like level with a few new textures, most notably an animated tv screen with a dog.

file.author: Scott McNutt
file.title: House of Traps (Spider)
file.description: Same as houstrps except this map has Willy the Spider in the last room.

file.author: Scott McNutt
file.title: House of Traps
file.description: Small Wizard map with some traps. Comes with a start map.

file.author: Scott McNutt
file.title: Hard Target 2
file.description: Medium sized Base map with some very tough custom monsters (SNG and RL grunts, laser drones, Manga Babe and two of her friends) as well as other progs.

file.author: Hrimfaxi
file.title: Frying obstacles
file.description: Large Metal fortress with a dragon boss fight and a few other custom progs.

file.author: Hrimfaxi
file.title: The Rest Is Silence
file.description: Around medium Knave-style fortress. Requires the Lost Chapters pack.

file.author: Hrimfaxi
file.title: Breakfast at twilight
file.description: A knave-textured castle built upon scraps by Kell and Drew and the author's speedmap from SM93.

file.author: Hrimfaxi
file.title: For Love of Evil
file.description:
Three independent levels connected by a start map. (You might want to load each of them manually so as to avoid starting the map with all weapons from the previous one).
  • Voidscape: Very small rocky island floating in space.
  • Brownie: Small medieval fortress with an atrium and tower areas.
  • For The Love Of Evil: Large Metal/runic map with majestic halls and various traps. (On hard difficulty, the map exceeds the max_edicts limit, so it requires a source port with increased limits).

file.author: Hrimfaxi
file.title: Hrimspeed
file.description: Small Base-style speedmap.

file.author: Hrimfaxi
file.title: Hrimturt
file.description: Two turtlemaps in a base theme. The second one features a submarine base.

file.author: Richard Neff
file.title: The Hub
file.description: Around medium sized simple Metal/ Wizard castle with long corridors, a church room and very few (base) enemies. Comes with a start map. Map sources are included. Barely average.

file.author: Anon/Ranger, ASO3000, David, DiamondBlack, DocDuodenum, Redead ITA, Sobersamson, Sockstah, Streaky, ZungryWare
file.title: HUH: A /vr/ mapping project
file.description:
A set of 11 beginner levels in various themes. Features a start map and a custom music track. The map sources are included.

Note: One of the maps (huh_tombandtower) requires a source port with increased limits.

file.author: ijed
file.title: Data Download
file.description:
A map built with no more than 256 brushes. Your mission is to download some data, but there are a couple of enemies who try to prevent that. Fast and frantic non-stop action.

Note: This map requires Quoth.

file.author: human[rus]
file.title: Human1320
file.description:
Medium to large spacious medieval level with long corridors. The map source is included.

Note: This map requires TF or MTF coop. Since there are no weapons/supplies, it cannot be played without.

file.author: Richard Dale Carlson
file.title: Demon Hunter
file.description: About medium sized confusing Wizard map.

file.author: iYago
file.title: Hushed Walls
file.description: Small to medium-sized level in Gloom Keep style, with a dark brick dungeon beneath. The map source is included.

file.author: Ing-ing, JCR, Newhouse, nyoeieoyn, PinchySkree, Qmaster, xlarve
file.title: Halloween Jam 2018
file.description:
Community map pack featuring six mostly Halloween/Horror-themed levels including haunted houses and graveyards. It also comes with a start map and lots of pumpkins, and runs on a slighlty stripped-down version of Arcane Dimensions that is included. The map sources are included as well.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Artistical, Burnham, CaptainCam, Chedap, Chris Holden, Comrade Beep, Greenwood, Here, JCR, Kayne, MortalMaxx, NewHouse, Pinchy, Thulsa, Yoder
file.title: Halloween Jam 2
file.description:
Second Halloween Jam community project featuring 14 levels of varying styles, and a start map. The levels run on the Arcane Dimensions mod (included). The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits.

file.author: Artistical, Entsoy, Fairweather, Greenwood, Makkon, Mista Heita, Mobin, Nyo, Pinchy, Quasiotter, Shades, Strideh, vbs, Voidforce, Xeo
file.title: Halloween Jam 3
file.description:
Third Halloween Jam, a community project featuring 13 levels + a start map in varying sizes and themes. Most of the maps use custom textures. The pack is based on the Arcane Dimensions mod (included) and comes with various custom content like models, sounds, skyboxes, and music tracks. Some of the map sources are included.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits + BSP2 support.

file.author: Artistical, Chris Holden, Fairweather, Greenwood, Grue, Omni, Pinchy, PQP, Riktoi
file.title: Halloween Jam 4
file.description:
Fourth Halloween Jam, a community project featuring eight levels + a start map in varying sizes and themes. Some of the maps use custom textures, e.g. Makkon and Alice. The pack runs on Arcane Dimensions 1.8 (included) and comes with various custom content like models, sounds, skyboxes, and music tracks. The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits and some of them BSP2 support.
The missing skybox for Riktoi's map can be downloaded here.

file.author: Mememind
file.title: Hydro Madness
file.description:
Medium sized base map using Alkaline 1.1 (NOT included).

"You stumble on a Dam that is poisoning the water supply, you should stop this. Destroy the reactor and fight through."

Note: this is v3.2, which is identical to v3.0 except with different packaging. Map source is included.

file.author: IcarusAvery
file.title: Lab Infiltration
file.description: Smallish, linear base+bricks style level. The map source is included.

file.author: Martin R. Goedtke (Iam)
file.title: Myworld is Yourworld
file.description: Medium sized brick/metal map with a Shub boss fight at the end.

file.author: Jim Lowell
file.title: Industrial Combat
file.description: Small Rubicon-style industrial level with a mine tunnels section.

file.author: Timothy R. Jervis
file.title: The Abandoned Silo
file.description:
Apparently you have to launch some rocket here. The map shows quite a bit of good potential but spoils the fun with shootable buttons (oh come on), confusing gameplay and other ugly things.

Note: The original zip did not include a txt file. It is available separately in /idgames/levels/g-i/icbm.txt though.

file.author: Alex Moore
file.title: Ickle
file.description: Very small linear mix-style map with a cave.

file.author: Ironhammer
file.title: Ih1m5
file.description: Small Base level - fifth map of the Badpak episode (though not included), hence has to be played with the mod.

file.author: Iikka "Fingers" Keränen
file.title: Before Nightfall
file.description: First map of the IKSPQ series: a small Wizard castle in the mountains.

file.author: Iikka "Fingers" Keränen
file.title: Temple of the Thousand-Faced Moon
file.description: Second map of the IKSPQ series: a medium sized blue temple map. Nice.

file.author: Iikka "Fingers" Keränen
file.title: Halls of the Shambler God
file.description: Third map of the IKSPQ series: a medium sized blue temple map. Nice.

file.author: Iikka "Fingers" Keränen
file.title: Homecoming
file.description: Fourth map of the IKSPQ series: a medium sized blue temple with an outside bit.

file.author: Iikka "Fingers" Keränen
file.title: The Secret Installation
file.description: Fifth map of the IKSPQ series: a medium-sized IKbase map.

file.author: Iikka "Fingers" Keränen
file.title: Welcome to IKSPQ
file.description: Start map of the IKSPQ series.

file.author: Biff Debris
file.title: The Corral
file.description: A beautiful base map that shines with graphical perfection. Gameplay is ok (only grunts and enforcers plus a few rotfish) and very straight-forward (no keys).

file.author: Biff Debris
file.title: House of Spikes
file.description: Just like Biff's previous map imp1sp1 this one is a beauty. The brushwork and texturing are perfect. Gameplay-wise it is very nice too.

file.author: Jaromir Bergmann
file.title: In Ovo
file.description:
Two large oldschool Base and Metal levels and an unfinished Wizard map. OK.
This file was repackaged by Spirit. You can find the original .zip in the trash

file.author: Dia Westerteicher
file.title: Infection
file.description: Small space base with a hidden UFO beneath. Comes with strange, ugly new textures and three custom monsters (Drone, Red Demon, Snakeman). Barely average.

file.author: ubiquitous
file.title: Infernal Ascent
file.description:
Small to medium-sized vertical mixed-texture map.

From the readme: Occasionally claustrophobic 90s style map with a mix of themes. The underlying "story" is that you are in some kind of base environment built in such a way that you must climb through three increasingly macabre gauntlets in order to escape.

file.author: David Jewsbury
file.title: Initial Horror
file.description: Medium sizish map with a mix of texture themes.

file.author: Chris Mayers
file.title: The Insurrection, part I - The Overlord's Legacy
file.description: Small Wizard level and a start map. First part of the Insurrection series - connected to ins2, ins3 and ins4. Barely average.

file.author: Chris Mayers
file.title: The Insurrection, part II - The Grand Opus
file.description: Medium sized Medieval map. Second part of the Insurrection series - connected to ins1, ins3 and ins4. Slightly confusing.

file.author: Chris Mayers
file.title: The Insurrection, part III - The Sanctuary
file.description: Medium sized Wizard map. Third part of the Insurrection series - connected to ins1, ins3 and ins4.

file.author: Chris Mayers
file.title: The Insurrection, part IV - The Resolution
file.description: Medium sized Metal map. Fourth part of the Insurrection series - connected to ins1, ins2 and ins3. OK.

file.author: Insane Ninja Viper
